description:
go/parser: minor cleanup

- there is no label scope at package level
- open/close all scopes symmetrically now
  that there is only one parse entry point
  (parseFile)

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6230047/diff/4002/src/pkg/go/parser/parser.go
File src/pkg/go/parser/parser.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6230047/diff/4002/src/pkg/go/parser/parser.go#newcode2313
src/pkg/go/parser/parser.go:2313: assert(p.labelScope == nil, "imbalanced label scopes")
the word you want is unbalanced.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0dc36a693538 ***

go/parser: minor cleanup

- there is no label scope at package level
- open/close all scopes symmetrically now
  that there is only one parse entry point
  (parseFile)

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6230047

subject: code review 6230047: go/parser: minor cleanup
